SignUp.title: Sign Up
SignUp.name: Organization Name
SignUp.422: The password should be at least 6 characters

SetPassword.title: Change temporary password
SetPassword.password-error-toast-message: An error occurred while changing the password

modal.title: Title
modal.tool-tip-text: It will go back to pending approval and your previous post will be deleted
modal.published-date-tool-tip-text: The date that the event will be published
modal.start-date-tool-tip-text: This is the start date of the event
modal.end-date-tool-tip-text: This is the end date of the event
modal.date-error-toast-message: The event start date must be before the event end date
modal.image-format-error-toast-message: The image format is not supported
modal.success-toast-message: The news has been sent for approbation
modal.post-error-toast-message: An error occurred while sending the news for approbation
modal.delete-title: Are your sure you want to delete this news?
modal.delete-error-toast-message: An error occurred while deleting the news
modal.reject-error-toast-message: An error occurred while rejecting the news
modal.approve-error-toast-message: An error occurred while approving the news
modal.draft-success-toast-message: The news has been saved as draft
modal.draft-error-toast-message: An error occurred while saving the news as draft
modal.alt-text-tooltip: An alt text is a brief written description of an image on a web page, used by screen readers for the visually impaired or when the image cannot be displayed.

image-cropper.zoom-hint: Use âŒ˜ + scroll (or ctrl + scroll) to zoom the image

Approbations.refuse-question: Why do you want to refuse this news?
Approbations.deactivate-question: Why do you want to deactivate this news?
Approbations.give-reason: Please give a reason for this action

Profile.tooltip-notify-me: Click on 'Notify me' to receive an email when {author} publishes a news.
Profile.enter-email: Enter the email you want to be notified at
Profile.email-success-toast-message: You will be notified by email when the author publishes a news. You can unsubscribe in the email you will receive.
Profile.email-error-toast-message: An error occurred while saving your email

Accounts.deactivate-error: An error occurred while deactivating the account

toggle.activation-title-no-organization: Are you sure you want to activate the account?
toggle.delete-title: Are your sure you want to delete the account of {organization}?
toggle.delete-title-no-organization: Are your sure you want to delete the account?
toggle.give-reason: Please give a reason for this action

socials-section.title: Socials
socials-section.info: Your socials will be displayed on your profile page, which is accessible by other users. We will not share nor use your socials for any other purpose.

profile-section.title: Profile
profile-section.drop-picture: Drop a picture here or click to upload

dialog.title: Reset your changes
